name: Jeanne d'Arc
temple_description:
Jeanne d'Arc was originally a mere human, but her unwavering faith and 
legendary trials elevated her to godhood. 
At the age of 13, she received divine revelation from Saint Michael, 
Saint Margaret, and Saint Catherine under a great tree near her village. 
Despite facing an unjust trial and execution, her sainthood was later 
recognized, immortalizing her as a divine warrior.

active_skills.name: Heavenly Revelation
active_skills.effect:
Deals 180% P.DMG to 3 enemies in the back row. 
If the enemy is affected by any debuff, the damage is doubled.

active_skills.name: Divination
active_skills.effect:
Deals 400% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP and enters [Frenzy] state. 
While in [Frenzy], Jeanneâ€™s basic attacks are guaranteed to crit, and 
she becomes immune to all debuffs for 3 rounds.
